title: Follow-up workflow: Fix contact coverage calculation used for multi-threading prompts

sections.text: Correct the backend logic that computes contact coverage per account/opportunity (roles/personas, active contacts, engagement recency) so multi-threading prompts are triggered from accurate data. Resolve cases where coverage is stale or incorrect after CRM syncs, contact merges, or opportunity stage changes, leading to missing or irrelevant prompts. Add lightweight telemetry for coverage inputs/outputs to validate prompt eligibility in production.
